sources.title: The Lake | Full Movie | Action Thai Monster Sci-Fi | English Subs
sources.description:
A gigantic and bloodthirsty monster emerges from a lake and unleashes its fury on a small town, leaving a trail of destruction in its wake.
2022. Stars: Chakrit Boonkeaw, Naiyana Bumee, Wanmai Chatborirak

metadata.Plot: When two people "connect," the bond between them can be so pure and simple as to stir hearts in heaven. When they connect in all the right places at all the wrong times, heaven weeps for broken hearts. To heal these broken hearts, heaven breaks time.
metadata.Writer: David Auburn, Eun-Jeong Kim, Ji Na Yeo
metadata.Actors: Keanu Reeves, Sandra Bullock, Christopher Plummer
